articles.title: Zealandia Is Earth's First Continent To Be Completely Mapped, Revealing Ancient Secrets - IFLScience
articles.description: The eighth continent of the world is almost entirely submerged underwater.
articles.content: Zealandia has been kicking about for a good 60 million years, having separated from the supercontinent Gondwana around that time. Its also almost entirely submerged underwater and wasnt even formally… [+2548 chars]
